lead_paragraph: MC CANN--Michael P. (1952-2016), of Delray Beach, Florida, died peacefully in his sleep on March 18, 2016, following a long illness. Born in Brooklyn on October 24, 1952 to Edward and Claire McCann, he moved as a child to Valley Stream, Long Island and attended Holy Cross High School in Flushing and Fordham University. An avid reader with a sharp mind, he had a quick but generous sense of humor and a deep affection for a cold beer. He worked for almost thirty years in television news production at WABC-TV in New York as Manager of Electronic News Gathering; there he met his wife, Linda (Wintermute) McCann, whom he married in 1991. He and his wife lived in Florida from 2002, where he served as Deputy Assistant Federal Security Director, TSA, Department of Homeland Security in West Palm Beach. He is survived by his devoted wife, parents, younger brother, Brian McCann, and beloved dogs, Lucy and Charlie. He will be sorely missed. 1/3
